actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax incentives to homeowners who invest in energy saving home improvements.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, for tax incentives to homeowners who invest in energy-saving home improvements. Limits the deduction allowed under this Act to $1,000 in any taxable year. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 219)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax incentives to homeowners who invest in energy saving home improvements.
